Title: The Planet of Stray Cats
Description: [The Planet of Stray Cats, ', the "grown-up" CG gag comedy anime from studio Plus Heads collaboration with the "Mad Max: Fury Road" film. The film\'s director George Miller himself approved this collaborative short. The anime features the nonsensical, surreal conversations of stray cats on a planet. The only voice cast member, named Monica, ad-libs the dialogue of all the characters.']
